Or mount ISO file:

drm_warning.message: {game_name} may have copy protection that requires a No-CD patch or crack to function properly.
instructions: Some older games used intrusive copy protection
No-CD patches remove disc checking requirements
Check community forums for compatibility information
Consider purchasing modern DRM-free versions when available

compatibility_warning.message: {game_name} may require specific Wine settings or Windows components to function properly.
instructions: Some applications need specific Wine configurations
Check Wine Application Database (AppDB) for tips
Consider using winetricks to install required components
Community forums often have working configurations

post_install_windows.title: Windows Application Installation Complete
instructions: If you installed an application:
Look in your system's application launcher (menu, dock, or search)
If this was a portable app:
Double-click this same file again to run it
notes: Either way, subsequent launches will be faster!

post_install_dos.title: DOS Program Setup Complete
instructions: If you installed a DOS application:
Look for the main executable file (like wp.exe for WordPerfect)
Double-click the main program file to run it
If this was a portable DOS program:
Double-click this same file again to run it
notes: DOSBox configurations are saved for consistent performance
Each DOS program gets its own optimized settings
